product_name: Serfas Double Espresso Key Bike Lock - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Serfas Double Espresso Key Bike Lock offers a small, lightweight and compact solution to keep your bike safe while you run into the grocery store or a grab a quick cup of coffee. Channel design lets you to secure your bike to just about anything-lock up multiple bikes to a post or lock your bikes to your roof rack while you're away from your car. Provides ample security for short times away from your bike while you stop for coffee, run a quick errand or return a library book. Easily slips into your backpack, seat bag or back pocket when not in use. 0.3 in.-diameter cable is 6 ft. long; rubber-coated finish protects from scratching your bike frame. Dust cover protects locking cylinder. The Serfas Double Espresso Key Bike Lock includes 2 keys. Closeout.
short_description: The Serfas Double Espresso Key Bike Lock offers a small, lightweight and compact solution to keep your bike safe while you run into the grocery store or a grab a quick cup of coffee.
